trends: There have been no other sightings in Douglas
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWas walking north on Oval Beach in Dougals Mich to do some fishing. It was clear out and the moon was full. Just northwest of the moon a bright light bigger and brighter than any star came on. It was about one tenth the size of the moon. I keep and eye on this bright light for 3 or 4 mins. I keep walking then the most crazy thing happen. A small light seam to come out of the bright light. And Started going south in a really fast in a back and forth motion. About 30 seconds afterwards The bright light went out and the little light keep going south. Chuck Beaudry
Summary: Saw a bright light a little light came out of the big one, The big light went out and the little kept going south.
